statements: SELECT * FROM AR_health_monitoring_devices;
SELECT person_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM AR_health_monitoring_devices;
SELECT device_id, data_timestamp, heart_rate FROM AR_health_monitoring_devices ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sync_id, person_id, blood_pressure FROM AR_health_monitoring_devices WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate FROM AR_health_monitoring_devices;
SELECT * FROM AR_health_monitoring_devices WHERE person_id = 123 ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC;
SELECT person_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM AR_health_monitoring_devices WHERE data_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT sync_id, device_id, data_timestamp FROM AR_health_monitoring_devices WHERE heart_rate > 100 AND blood_pressure < 80 ORDER BY sync_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(heart_rate), MAX(blood_pressure) FROM AR_health_monitoring_devices WHERE person_id IN (456, 789) GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT DISTINCT person_id, COUNT(device_id) AS device_count FROM AR_health_monitoring_devices WHERE blood_pressure IS NULL GROUP BY person_id ORDER BY person_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM health_monitoring_devices LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, device_name, heart_rate FROM health_monitoring_devices WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT device_id, sync_date FROM health_monitoring_devices WHERE activity_level > 5 ORDER BY sync_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_name, sync_date, activity_level FROM health_monitoring_devices WHERE heart_rate BETWEEN 60 AND 80;
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM wellness_insights WHERE insight_id < 50 ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT device_name, heart_rate FROM health_monitoring_devices WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY sync_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM wellness_insights WHERE user_id = 200 AND created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, heart_rate, activity_level FROM health_monitoring_devices WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND activity_level < 3 ORDER BY device_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, user_id, device_name, sync_date FROM health_monitoring_devices WHERE sync_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY sync_date ASC;
SELECT insight_description, recommendation, created_at FROM wellness_insights WHERE user_id = 300 AND CHAR_LENGTH(recommendation) > 100;
SELECT * FROM ar_health_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM ar_health_devices WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, full_name, gender FROM user_profile WHERE age > 30;
SELECT insight_type, insight_description FROM wellness_insights ORDER BY insight_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, sync_timestamp FROM ar_health_devices WHERE sync_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM ar_health_devices;
SELECT user_id, full_name, age, gender FROM user_profile ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, sync_timestamp FROM ar_health_devices WHERE device_type = 'Smartwatch';
SELECT device_name, user_id, sync_timestamp FROM ar_health_devices WHERE sync_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sync_timestamp DESC;
SELECT insight_type, insight_description FROM wellness_insights WHERE insight_type = 'Daily Report';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, heart_rate, time_stamp FROM health_data ORDER BY heart_rate DESC;
SELECT recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT device_name, connection_status FROM devices WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT email, gender FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT username, age, gender FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT user_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM health_data WHERE heart_rate > 80 ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, connection_status FROM devices WHERE connection_status = TRUE ORDER BY device_name;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, gender FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY device_name;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, email, gender FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age <= 40;

SELECT u.username, d.device_name, hd.heart_rate, hd.steps_count FROM users u INNER JOIN devices d ON u.user_id = d.user_id INNER JOIN health_data hd ON d.device_id = hd.device_id WHERE u.age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT u.username, w.workout_type, w.duration FROM users u INNER JOIN workouts w ON u.user_id = w.user_id WHERE u.gender = 'Female' ORDER BY w.duration DESC;
SELECT r.recommendation_text, u.username FROM recommendations r INNER JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.created_at >= '2021-01-01';
